metadata.title: CVE-2023-2241

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP5

metadata.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in PoDoFo 0.10.0. Affected is the function readXRefStreamEntry of the file PdfXRefStreamParserObject.cpp. The manipulation leads to heap-based buffer overflow. An attack has to be approached locally. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The patch is identified as 535a786f124b739e3c857529cecc29e4eeb79778. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. VDB-227226 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP5 is installed
